comments.text:
Remaining 8 moderate vulnerabilities require breaking changes:

1. Electron 34 → 40 (ASAR integrity bypass - GHSA-vmqv-hx8q-j7mg)
2. electron-vite 2 → 5 (esbuild dev server issue - GHSA-67mh-4wv8-2f99)

Both are development/build-time only, low production risk.
Testing required after upgrade due to major API changes.
